g_lock_conflicts  PLS_INTEGER := 0;


FUNCTION pkv_select_row( i_pkv_ID   IN  lm_package_attribute_values.ID%TYPE
                       , o_rt_pkv   OUT lm_package_attribute_values%ROWTYPE )
RETURN BOOLEAN
;

                           , i_pkv_PKA_ID   IN  lm_package_attribute_values.PKA_ID%TYPE

RETURN BOOLEAN
;

                               , i_pkv_PKA_ID   IN  lm_package_attribute_values.PKA_ID%TYPE

RETURN BOOLEAN

;

PROCEDURE pkv_lock_row_nowait( i_pkv_ID   IN  lm_package_attribute_values.ID%TYPE )

PROCEDURE pkv_insert_row ( io_rt_pkv  IN OUT lm_package_attribute_values%ROWTYPE )

RETURN BOOLEAN

END lm_pkv_tapi_pck;

function pkv_select_row( i_pkv_id   in  lm_package_attribute_values.id%type
                       , o_rt_pkv   out lm_package_attribute_values%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pkv_select_row';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_pkv ( i_pkv_id   in  lm_package_attribute_values.id%type )
      is 
           select *
             from lm_package_attribute_values pkv
            where pkv.id = i_pkv_id ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_pkv( i_pkv_id => i_pkv_id );
         fetch c_pkv into o_rt_pkv;
         l_found := c_pkv%found;
         close c_pkv;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc 
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_pkv%isopen
         then
            close c_pkv;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pkv_select_row;

function pkv_select_row_uk1( i_pkv_pet_id   in  lm_package_attribute_values.pet_id%type
                           , i_pkv_pka_id   in  lm_package_attribute_values.pka_id%type
                           , i_pkv_pkv_order   in  lm_package_attribute_values.pkv_order%type
                           , o_rt_pkv  out lm_package_attribute_values%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pkv_select_row_uk1';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   declare
      cursor c_pkv ( i_pkv_pet_id   in  lm_package_attribute_values.pet_id%type
                   , i_pkv_pka_id   in  lm_package_attribute_values.pka_id%type
                   , i_pkv_pkv_order   in  lm_package_attribute_values.pkv_order%type )
      is
         select *
           from lm_package_attribute_values pkv
          where pkv.pet_id = i_pkv_pet_id 
            and pkv.pka_id = i_pkv_pka_id 
            and pkv.pkv_order = i_pkv_pkv_order ;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         open c_pkv(i_pkv_pet_id => i_pkv_pet_id, i_pkv_pka_id => i_pkv_pka_id, i_pkv_pkv_order => i_pkv_pkv_order);
         fetch c_pkv into o_rt_pkv;
         l_found := c_pkv%found;
         close c_pkv;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
   when others
    then
      if c_pkv%isopen
      then
         close c_pkv;
      end if;
      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pkv_select_row_uk1;

function pkv_select_row_upd( i_pkv_id   in  lm_package_attribute_values.id%type
                           , o_rt_pkv   out lm_package_attribute_values%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pkv_select_row_upd';
   l_found                boolean      := false;

   cursor c_pkv ( i_pkv_id   in  lm_package_attribute_values.id%type )
   is
           select *
             from lm_package_attribute_values pkv
            where pkv.id = i_pkv_id 
         for update;
begin
   viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

   
   open c_pkv( i_pkv_id => i_pkv_id );
   fetch c_pkv into o_rt_pkv;
   l_found := c_pkv%found;
   close c_pkv;

   viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                          , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

   return l_found;

exception
   when others
   then
      if c_pkv%isopen
      then
         close c_pkv;
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

      viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );

end pkv_select_row_upd;

function pkv_select_row_upd_uk1( i_pkv_pet_id   in  lm_package_attribute_values.pet_id%type

                               , i_pkv_pkv_order   in  lm_package_attribute_values.pkv_order%type
                               , o_rt_pkv  out lm_package_attribute_values%rowtype )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pkv_select_row_upd_uk1';
   l_found                boolean      := false;
begin
   begin
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      
      l_found := pkv_select_row_uk1( i_pkv_pet_id   =>  i_pkv_pet_id
                                   , i_pkv_pka_id   =>  i_pkv_pka_id
                                   , i_pkv_pkv_order   =>  i_pkv_pkv_order
                                   , o_rt_pkv => o_rt_pkv );
      if l_found
      then
         
         l_found := pkv_select_row_upd( i_pkv_id => o_rt_pkv.id
                                      , o_rt_pkv => o_rt_pkv );
      end if;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );

      return l_found;

   exception
      when others
      then
        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

        viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc);
   end;
end pkv_select_row_upd_uk1;

procedure pkv_lock_row( i_pkv_id   in  lm_package_attribute_values.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pkv_lock_row';
begin
  declare
     cursor c_pkv ( i_pkv_id   in  lm_package_attribute_values.id%type )
     is
             select ''
               from lm_package_attribute_values pkv
              where pkv.id = i_pkv_id 
         for update;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         
         if i_pkv_id is not null
         then
            begin
                
                pkv_lock_row_nowait( i_pkv_id => i_pkv_id );
            exception
               when viu_constant.exc_lockfailed
               then
                  
                  g_lock_conflicts := g_lock_conflicts + 1;

                  
                  viu_info.reset_package_variables;

                  
                  open c_pkv( i_pkv_id => i_pkv_id );
                  close c_pkv;
               end;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         if c_pkv%isopen
         then
            close c_pkv;
         end if;

         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info(i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pkv_lock_row;

procedure pkv_lock_row_nowait( i_pkv_id   in  lm_package_attribute_values.id%type )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pkv_lock_row_nowait';
begin
   declare
      cursor c_pkv ( i_pkv_id   in  lm_package_attribute_values.id%type )
      is
              select ''
                from lm_package_attribute_values pkv
               where pkv.id = i_pkv_id 
          for update nowait;

   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin

         
         if i_pkv_id is not null
         then
            
            open c_pkv( i_pkv_id => i_pkv_id );

            close c_pkv;
         end if;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
        if c_pkv%isopen
        then
           close c_pkv;
        end if;

        viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                               , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

        viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_lockfailed
                           , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                           , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                           , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                           , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_pkv_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end pkv_lock_row_nowait;

                           , io_rt_pkv  in out lm_package_attribute_values%rowtype )
return number
;

function pkv_perform_delete( i_pkv_id   in  lm_package_attribute_values.id%type )
return boolean
;

procedure pkv_insert_row ( io_rt_pkv  in out lm_package_attribute_values%rowtype )
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pkv_insert_row';
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      
      begin
         insert into lm_package_attribute_values( id
                                , pet_id
                                , pka_id
                                , pkv_order
                                , value )
              values ( io_rt_pkv.id
                     , io_rt_pkv.pet_id
                     , io_rt_pkv.pka_id
                     , io_rt_pkv.pkv_order
                     , io_rt_pkv.value )
           returning id
                   , pet_id
                   , pka_id
                   , pkv_order
                   , value
                into io_rt_pkv.id
                   , io_rt_pkv.pet_id
                   , io_rt_pkv.pka_id
                   , io_rt_pkv.pkv_order
                   , io_rt_pkv.value;

      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_insertfailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_pkv.id||'"'
                                                             ||', PET_ID = "'||io_rt_pkv.pet_id||'"'
                                                             ||', PKA_ID = "'||io_rt_pkv.pka_id||'"'
                                                             ||', PKV_ORDER = "'||io_rt_pkv.pkv_order||'"'
                                                             ||', VALUE = "'||io_rt_pkv.value||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pkv_insert_row;

function pkv_perform_update( i_pkv_id   in     lm_package_attribute_values.id%type
                           , io_rt_pkv  in out lm_package_attribute_values%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pkv_perform_update';
begin
   
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module(i_module => con_proc);

      begin
         update lm_package_attribute_values
            set id = io_rt_pkv.id
              , pet_id = io_rt_pkv.pet_id
              , pka_id = io_rt_pkv.pka_id
              , pkv_order = io_rt_pkv.pkv_order
              , value = io_rt_pkv.value
          where id = i_pkv_id
      returning id
              , pet_id
              , pka_id
              , pkv_order
              , value
           into io_rt_pkv.id
              , io_rt_pkv.pet_id
              , io_rt_pkv.pka_id
              , io_rt_pkv.pkv_order
              , io_rt_pkv.value;

         l_rowcount := sql%rowcount;
      exception
         when others
         then
            viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                               , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                               , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                               , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                               , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_pkv.id||'"'
                                                             ||', PET_ID = "'||io_rt_pkv.pet_id||'"'
                                                             ||', PKA_ID = "'||io_rt_pkv.pka_id||'"'
                                                             ||', PKV_ORDER = "'||io_rt_pkv.pkv_order||'"'
                                                             ||', VALUE = "'||io_rt_pkv.value||'"'                                                              , 1, 4000));
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount)||' rows updated' );

      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pkv_perform_update;

function pkv_perform_delete( i_pkv_id   in  lm_package_attribute_values.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pkv_perform_delete';
begin
   
   declare
      l_found  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         delete
           from lm_package_attribute_values
          where id = i_pkv_id;

         l_found := sql%found;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => case l_found when true then 'found' else 'notfound' end );
      return l_found;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_pkv_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end pkv_perform_delete;

function pkv_update_row( i_pkv_id   in     lm_package_attribute_values.id%type
                       , io_rt_pkv  in out lm_package_attribute_values%rowtype )
return number
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pkv_update_row';
begin
   declare
      l_rowcount  number := 0;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         pkv_lock_row( i_pkv_id   =>  i_pkv_id );

         
         l_rowcount := 
            pkv_perform_update( i_pkv_id   =>  i_pkv_id
                              , io_rt_pkv  => io_rt_pkv );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                             , i_debug_info => to_char(l_rowcount) ||' rows updated');
      return l_rowcount;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm);

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_updatefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   => substr('ID = "'||io_rt_pkv.id||'"'
                                                          ||', PET_ID = "'||io_rt_pkv.pet_id||'"'
                                                          ||', PKA_ID = "'||io_rt_pkv.pka_id||'"'
                                                          ||', PKV_ORDER = "'||io_rt_pkv.pkv_order||'"'
                                                          ||', VALUE = "'||io_rt_pkv.value||'"'                                                           , 1, 4000));
   end;                                                          
end pkv_update_row;

function pkv_delete_row( i_pkv_id   in  lm_package_attribute_values.id%type )
return boolean
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pkv_delete_row';
begin
   declare
      l_deleted  boolean := false;
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         
         pkv_lock_row( i_pkv_id   =>  i_pkv_id );

         
         l_deleted := pkv_perform_delete( i_pkv_id   =>  i_pkv_id );
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_deleted;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module     => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_ifo_nr            => viu_constant.c_ifo_deletefailed
                            , i_calling_procedure => con_proc
                            , i_severity          => viu_info.c_severity_error
                            , i_info_arguments    => g_con_table_name
                            , i_additional_data   =>   'ID = "'||i_pkv_id||'"' );
   end;                                                          
end pkv_delete_row;

function pkv_seq1_nextval
return lm_package_attribute_values.id%type
is
   con_proc  constant     varchar2(61) := g_con_pack || '.pkv_seq1_nextval';
   l_pkv_id  lm_package_attribute_values.id%type;
begin
   begin                                                         
      viu_module.enter_module( i_module => con_proc );

      begin
         select lm_pkv_seq1.nextval 
           into l_pkv_id
           from dual;
      end;

      viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc );

      return l_pkv_id;
   exception
      when others
      then
         viu_module.leave_module( i_module => con_proc
                                , i_debug_info => sqlerrm );

         viu_info.raise_info( i_calling_procedure => con_proc );
   end;                                                          
end pkv_seq1_nextval;


end lm_pkv_tapi_pck;
